评论详情: I love these shirts, They are buttery soft and snug but not restricting. They are on the shorter side right between a crop and T-Shirt. I am 5’4 144lbs athletic build and went to a large and it’s the prefect size.

These shirts are literally the best quality shirts I've bought from any company and have held up well throughout the span of a few months! These shirts feel stretchy, but not loose-fitting at all and don't have the cotton feel to them, the texture feels flexible more than anything. Also looks exactly as advertised. Will definitely buy again. If you're second-guessing yourself on buying this, I'd say go ahead and buy it as I've had no issues!

I like the fabric and was pleasantly surprised with the length (I’m 5’ 9”). I bought these mostly to wear under things and unfortunately, the neck is a little wonky. The trim stands up a bit, like a micro-mock neck?

What I like about these shirts is that they’re flattering if you have a nice body—they highlight your shape while still being conservative. However, if you’re on the chunkier side, I wouldn’t recommend them because they tend to show every flaw. I sized up to account for potential shrinking in the wash, and that worked well for me. they are so soft, perfect for working out and day to day wear definitely ordering more colors

评论概述: Comfortable supportive shirts, but rides up!
评论详情: I bought these shirts to wear to work, as I only had button down shirts available to me. These shirts are thin, but also cozy. They are NOT see through but they also aren't super heavy.  Its a super sleek material, feels like microfiber. It also makes you look more put together (it seems like it has some sort of tummy control).  My only complaint is the length of the shirt. I am 5'7", with a normal sized torso, around 250lbs and bought in a size X Large. The shirt barely goes past the middle of my hips (to be fair, I have really large hips and it is slightly higher than where its supposed to be). This becomes a problem when I am bending down, because the shirt rides up and my thong is exposed :(. But, I am more careful now wearing the shirt.

Absolutely love these tops. I wish you could buy colors without having to buy a black and white each time, but I’m slowly purchasing all of them lol they have the perfect compression and fit like a glove. I’m 4’11 115lbs and buy a small.
I purchased the 3 packs Red white & black wearing the Red top with my Green Checkered leggings & my floral skirt!!!

I liked the quality of the shirt, the material was pretty thick, the colors were nice, but I did size up when I ordered and I’d recommend maybe sizing 2 up. Length was good-I’m 5’9 and it came down to just under my belly button
I really love these shirts! They are soft as butter and after multiple washes and wears, they are still holding up well. They are definitely worth the money.

They will work well under jackets as they aren’t bulky.

As much as I like fun colors and prints, I reach for these solid tees more than anything. The material is soft and stretchy and almost fits like compression material. 评论概述: Top is bigger than the bottom
评论详情: I saw so many reviews saying to size up and since I’m pregnant, I did. The top portion of the shirt is much wider than the bottom half. I have a large chest area and it was still too big and loose. Stay true to size. A lot of women saying that the arms are tight for their normal size are probably not an actual a size small. Many brands make clothes much larger now so these shirts are actually true to size compared to other brands making clothes bigger for our ever growing population.
